comments: This file describes the WebAssembly ISA.
Scripts in this folder auto-generate C++ code for JavaScriptCore as well as the testing DSL which WebKit's WebAssembly tests use.

Table.description: Indirect function table and other tables

block.description: begin a sequence of expressions, yielding 0 or 1 values

loop.description: begin a block which can also form control flow loops

rethrow.description: rethrow the exception at the top of the stack

br.description: break that targets an outer nested block

br_if.description: conditional break that targets an outer nested block

immediate.name: target_count
immediate.description: number of entries in the target_table

immediate.name: target_table
immediate.description: target entries that indicate an outer block or loop to which to break

immediate.name: default_target
immediate.description: an outer block or loop to which to break in the default case

return.description: return zero or one value from this function

delegate.description: delegate to a parent try block

select.description: select one of two values based on condition

immediate.name: target_types_count
immediate.description: number of entries in the target types vector

immediate.name: target_types
immediate.description: target types that indicate result of select instruction

annotated_select.description: the same as just select but with the annotation for result types

end.description: end a block, loop, or if

i32.const.description: a constant value interpreted as i32

i64.const.description: a constant value interpreted as i64

f64.const.description: a constant value interpreted as f64

f32.const.description: a constant value interpreted as f32

ref.is_null.description: determine if a reference is null

ref.func.description: return a reference to the function at the given index

get_local.description: read a local variable or parameter

set_local.description: write a local variable or parameter

tee_local.description: write a local variable or parameter and return the same value

table.init.description: initialize table from a given element

elem.drop.description: prevents further use of a passive element segment

table.grow.description: grow a table by the given delta and return the previous size, or -1 if enough space cannot be allocated

table.size.description: get the size of a table

table.fill.description: fill entries [i,i+n) with the given value

table.copy.description: copy table elements from dst_table[dstOffset, dstOffset + length] to src_table[srcOffset, srcOffset + length]

memory.fill.description: sets all values in a region to a given byte

memory.copy.description: copies data from a source memory region to destination region

memory.init.description: copies data from a passive data segment into a memory

data.drop.description: shrinks the size of the segment to zero

call.description: call a function by its index

call_indirect.description: call a function indirect with an expected signature

struct.get.description: reads the field from a structure

struct.set.description: sets the field from a structure
